terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.content:
## Acceptance of Terms

By accessing and using CircleMarketplace.io, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

## Use License

Permission is granted to temporarily access the materials on CircleMarketplace.io for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only.

## Account Terms

- You must be 18 years or older to use this service.
- You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account.
- You may not use the service for any illegal purpose.

## Service Modifications

CircleMarketplace.io reserves the right to modify or discontinue the service with or without notice.

## Limitation of Liability

In no event shall CircleMarketplace.io be liable for any damages arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on our platform.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content:
## Information We Collect

We collect information you provide directly to us, including:
- Name and contact information
- Account credentials
- Payment information
- Transaction history

## How We Use Your Information

We use the information we collect to:
- Provide, maintain, and improve our services
- Process transactions
- Send you technical notices and support messages
- Respond to your comments and questions

## Information Sharing

We do not share your personal information with third parties except:
- With your consent
- To comply with laws
- To protect our rights

## Data Security

We use industry-standard security measures including 256-bit SSL encryption to protect your data.

## Your Rights

You have the right to:
- Access your personal data
- Correct inaccurate data
- Request deletion of your data
- Opt out of marketing communications

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.content:
## What Are Cookies

Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit our website.

## How We Use Cookies

We use cookies to:
- Keep you signed in
- Understand how you use our service
- Improve your experience
- Show you relevant content

## Types of Cookies We Use

**Essential Cookies**: Required for the website to function properly.

**Analytics Cookies**: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website.

**Preference Cookies**: Remember your settings and preferences.

## Managing Cookies

You can control cookies through your browser settings. Note that disabling cookies may affect website functionality.

compliance.title: Compliance Information
compliance.content:
## RESPA Compliance

CircleMarketplace.io complies with the Real Estate Settlement Procedures Act (RESPA). We do not engage in:
- Kickbacks for referrals
- Unearned fees
- Required use of specific service providers

## UDAP Compliance

We adhere to Unfair or Deceptive Acts or Practices regulations:
- All pricing is clearly disclosed
- No hidden fees
- Transparent vendor relationships

## PCI DSS Compliance

We maintain Payment Card Industry Data Security Standards compliance for secure payment processing.

## ADA Compliance

Our platform strives to meet Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 Level AA standards.

## Geographic Restrictions

Services are available only where permitted by law. Some services may be restricted in certain jurisdictions.

sellerAgreement.title: Seller Agreement
sellerAgreement.content:
## Seller Responsibilities

As a seller on CircleMarketplace.io, you agree to:
- Provide accurate service descriptions
- Honor published pricing
- Maintain professional standards
- Respond to inquiries promptly
- Fulfill services as described

## Listing Requirements

- All listings must be accurate and complete
- Pricing must be clearly stated
- Service limitations must be disclosed
- Verify marks require documentation

## Prohibited Activities

Sellers may not:
- List services they cannot fulfill
- Engage in price manipulation
- Provide false information
- Circumvent platform fees

## Payment Terms

- Platform fees are deducted from transactions
- Payments processed within 5-7 business days
- Refunds handled per platform policy

## Account Termination

We reserve the right to suspend or terminate seller accounts for policy violations.

buyerProtection.title: Buyer Protection
buyerProtection.content:
## Our Commitment to Buyers

CircleMarketplace.io is committed to protecting buyers through:
- Secure payment processing
- Verified vendor program
- Dispute resolution process
- Transparent pricing

## What's Protected

- Services not delivered as described
- Unauthorized charges
- Quality issues with documented evidence

## Filing a Claim

To file a buyer protection claim:
1. Contact the seller first to resolve the issue
2. If unresolved, submit a formal dispute within 30 days
3. Provide documentation and evidence
4. Await review (typically 5-10 business days)

## Refund Process

Approved claims result in:
- Full or partial refund
- Points restoration (if applicable)
- Vendor review impact

## Limitations

Buyer protection does not cover:
- Buyer's remorse
- Services correctly delivered
- Issues not reported within timeframe

prohibited.title: Prohibited Items & Services
prohibited.content:
## Prohibited Services

The following services are not permitted on CircleMarketplace.io:

### Illegal Services
- Any service illegal under federal, state, or local law
- Unlicensed professional services requiring licensure
- Services violating RESPA or other real estate regulations

### Dangerous Services
- Services posing safety risks without proper certification
- Asbestos or lead-based services by unlicensed providers
- Structural work without proper licensing

### Fraudulent Practices
- Appraisal manipulation
- Fake reviews or testimonials
- Misleading service descriptions
- Guarantee of loan approval or specific outcomes

### Restricted Content
- Adult or explicit content
- Discriminatory services
- Services targeting vulnerable populations

## Enforcement

Violations result in:
- Immediate listing removal
- Account suspension or termination
- Legal action if warranted
- Report to relevant authorities

disputeResolution.title: Dispute Resolution
disputeResolution.content:
## Dispute Resolution Process

### Step 1: Direct Communication
Attempt to resolve the issue directly with the other party through our messaging system.

### Step 2: Formal Dispute
If direct communication fails, file a formal dispute:
- Provide detailed description
- Include supporting documentation
- Submit within 30 days of issue

### Step 3: Platform Review
Our team will:
- Review all evidence from both parties
- Request additional information if needed
- Issue a decision within 5-10 business days

### Step 4: Mediation
For unresolved disputes over $500:
- Professional mediation available
- Costs split between parties
- Non-binding recommendations

### Step 5: Arbitration
For disputes not resolved through mediation:
- Binding arbitration available
- Governed by American Arbitration Association rules
- Decision is final and enforceable

## Prohibited Resolution Methods

- Public defamation
- Harassment
- Legal action before completing platform process

refundPolicy.title: Refund Policy
refundPolicy.content:
## Refund Eligibility

Refunds may be issued when:
- Service not delivered as described
- Seller cancels confirmed booking
- Service quality significantly below standard
- Documented breach of seller agreement

## Refund Timeframes

**Before Service Delivery:**
- Full refund if canceled 48+ hours before scheduled service
- 50% refund if canceled 24-48 hours before
- No refund if canceled less than 24 hours before

**After Service Delivery:**
- Claim must be filed within 30 days
- Review process takes 5-10 business days
- Refund issued within 5-7 business days if approved

## Refund Methods

- Original payment method
- Platform credit
- Points restoration (if applicable)

## Partial Refunds

Partial refunds may be issued when:
- Service partially completed
- Minor issues with deliverables
- Mutually agreed resolution

## Non-Refundable Items

- Services completed as described
- Buyer's remorse
- Issues caused by buyer
- Services outside refund timeframe
